EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Agile Series #3 - EMEA - 2015.01.29.Email - Last Call Invite - EMEA
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Automate Agile Testing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Agile Webinar Series: Automate Agile Testing
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Join our webinar to learn how Tosca Testsuite can help your enterprise optimize risk coverage through agile testing practices. The webinar will be presented by Tricentis’ own Roman Zednik, Worldwide Director for Pre-sales Consulting.
The webinar will focus on the following key features:
- Risk Analysis and Coverage Optimization of epics and user stories - Test Automation (GUI and non GUI – API testing) - How Tosca fits into Continuous Integration
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-agile-series-3-emea.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-agile-series-3-emea.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Thu Jan 29, 2015 3:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m. CET 9:00 a.m. – 10:00 a.m. EST
Roman Zednik Worldwide Director for Pre-sales Consulting Tricentis
Michael Eckhoff Senior VP of Worldwide Sales Tricentis
